My Vision

My goal is to become an Instructional Designer in higher education, designing and developing online/hybrid courses and helping instructors reach their potential in teaching and fulfill their missions in education.

I have extensive knowledge and eight years of experiences about Instructional Design, adult learning, and cutting-edge learning technologies. I would Use my professional knowledge to help people to enjoy technology at work.

Documents

Resume

CV

About Me

               

I worked as an instructional designer and a faculty member in higher education for the past ten years. After pursuing my seconde Master's degree in Instructional Systems Technology at Indiana University Bloomington, I will set sail again in the higher education ocean. I am also a mom of two wonderful daughters, and a woman who loves the world and the life. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions about my portfolio.
